DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether CP-866,087 is effective in the weight loss of overweight patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study To Determine The Effects And Safety Of A Weight Loss Compound On Overweight, Otherwise Healthy, Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index (BMI) 30 to 40 kg/m2 and total body weight of >110 lbs. Otherwise healthy Women must be of nonchildbearing potential. Significant current or history of medical illness.
